#### How should this be manually tested?
- Clone the project

       https://github.com/Kagorora/kagorora_portofolio.git

- Move to the chat branch

       git checkout ft-skills-card-173303303

- Install the package dependencies

       npm run install

- Start the serve

       npm run start
